name: Hive World
description:
Hive World is a turn based strategy game.

In the year 2050 the world is overpopulated and the last hope of the humanity is to colonize other planets. But before that, we have to research how to do it. It’s your job, during this period, manage the United Nations money and decide if invest in science research or to help all the countries with crisis and avoid a possible global war.

The game is turn based. Every turn is an entire year. Every year you will earn some millions dollars and you will have to decide where it goes: to the critical countries or to the science research. But with every non-resolved crisis the global tension will rise and if it reaches the 100% the world war III will start and you will lose the game.

The game can be downloaded for windows

################DISCLAIMER##############

This game has been created in 72h for  the ludum dare #42

The strategy games need more testing time than arcade games. Please, at the moment to play the game consider that I didn’t have enough time to test everything. Moreover, I don’t know if the game is even winnable. Just, consider that when playing it. Just try to enjoy it :P

Of course, any (constructive) critic will be accepted and appreciate. Thank you!
